sections.title: Experiments
sections.description: These are programming odds and ends that I've worked on. Some of these are games, explorations of frameworks, things I find interesting, or things I want to learn.

projects.title: Warehouse
projects.description: A warehouse scene made with Blender, rendered using ThreeJS, with controls built in React. Put some boxes on a shelf.

projects.title: Material Tests
projects.description: A place to view exports from Blender to see how materials settings behave in ThreeJS.

projects.title: LightsOut
projects.description: Based on a handheld puzzle game, this is written in HTML/JavaScript.

projects.title: Wait
projects.description: An endless series of dialog boxes and interactions. Written in React using Tailwind.
